body:
David: https://staff.tumblr.com/post/5845153911 [draft] Topherchris: are you freaking serious
 David: If you're okay with it - I'd love to :)
Topherchris: i'm okay with it, if you're okay with it destroying tumblr

dialogue.name: David
dialogue.phrase: If you're okay with it - I'd love to :)
